Reviews.Title: “Well run Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: PatUNH1980
Reviews.Content: I stayed here during Super Bowl weekend in Indy. The hotel was very clean, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and the location was easy to get in and out of. I will definitely stay here again when I am in the area on business.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, well maintained, great service”
Reviews.Author: mckitar
Reviews.Content: The staff were great and very helpful. They gave suggestions for dining and knew the area. Our room was clean and neat with everything on good repair. The bed was very comfortable and I loved the sheets. The pool was a bit cold but we asked about it and the temperture was turned up! Breakfast area was well stocked and kept clean. There is a lot of dining and shopping near by and is in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: ls66611
Reviews.Content: We stay here when we are in Indy. Nice folks that are very helpful. Nice big indoor pool for the kids. Breakfast is included do that's nice.

Reviews.Title: “Mediocre at Best”
Reviews.Author: BFR1920
Reviews.Content: I wanted to do some Black Friday shopping in Indianapolis and chose this Hampton for it's location near Castleton Mall. Other than location, I have little else positive to share. The staff was nice enough but the sheets needed to be replaced, our room shared a wall with the indoor pool so we could hear everyone at the pool, and the breakfast had stale bagels and hot OJ. I definitely won't be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Hoosierfan_7
Reviews.Content: We have spent a few nights here at various times when we visit the Indianapolis area. Each time, the staff at check in has shown that "midwest hospitality" by being friendly and helpful with any questions we have ever had about nearby restaurants, shopping, and directions. I wish I would have written down their names so I could tell their supervisor about how welcome each of them has always made us feel. The rooms are nice...some have been better than others, but that's like any other hotel. The beds are comfortable, room size is average but perfect for us as we don't spend much time in the room, and the bathroom is sufficient for two. The complimentary breakfast is always good and the dining area is clean. There are two nearby restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. The Thai Orchid is a good choice if you like Thai food, and Charleston's is a nice casual restaurant with a varied menu. The front desk staff of the Hampton will give you free coupons for Charlestons if you ask them. We have never used the pool, but it's indoor and doesn't ever seem to be very busy. The hotel is located in the perfect location if you are planning on shopping at the nearby Castleton or Keystone Fashion malls. There are a lot of nearby choices for shopping, eating, and movies.

Reviews.Title: “Ugh...”
Reviews.Author: Jason H
Reviews.Content: Horrible Smell from both the room and the customer service here. After putting up with it the first night, the smell in the room got much worse. I brought this to the attention of the front desk, who sprayed something on the carpet and said it was not that bad... but since she was not the one staying in there I don't think what she thought matters too much. Her manager was not much more helpful since the manager was trying to make me pay for the room... despite the smell. Hopefully we can work this out in the morning. -Poor Customer Service -Horrible TV's (crackling and fuzzy) -Poor cleanliness -Not very comfortable bed -Horrible smell

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfy”
Reviews.Author: Laura E
Reviews.Content: Stayed here several times recently and have not been disappointed. Staff is friendly and helpful, decent breakfast, nice pool and very clean rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and clean.”
Reviews.Author: sgi10
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Hampton Inn for four nights for business and was quite comfortable. It's your standard Hampton Inn, with a nice indoor pool. The location was convenient to hospital, shopping, and dining. If I were in the area again, I would certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: mommart
Reviews.Content: Stayed here while visiting colleges in the area. The hotel is well kept and the staff is wonderful. Would happily stay her again!

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected surprises every day”
Reviews.Author: mhrupp
Reviews.Content: To begin with, I booked two rooms, one king and one queen, non-smoking. The first night was uneventful but the next morning I noticed my air conditioner not working and it started to smell HOT. I called the front desk and they immediately sent someone to check it out. I was offered another room with a King upgrade. That was ok, no problem but that evening the fire alarms went off and a lot of us staying didn't know what that sound was. We immediately ran out into the parking lot where the fire truck and fireman were trying to put out a smoldering fire in the mulch. The next morning I rode down in the elevator with a couple that said, earlier in the day, the day before (same day as the smoldering fire) a fire truck was called to the hotel because the elevator seemed a little hot. When we left on Monday, the fire alarms went off again for the third time but we are not sure what happened. So unexpected, not staying there again. Rooms were very clean however. It was just the 3 times the fire alarms went off, was a little much.

Reviews.Title: “Not up to Hampton standards”
Reviews.Author: LynnesPicks
Reviews.Content: We selected this hotel on our way home from Tennessee due to the fact that it was a Hampton. This hotel was updated but I guess they didn't think about the sheets. I took pictures of the torn sheets and showed them to the front desk person when we checked out. It did not seem to bother her at all. I then emailed the pictures etc to the GM who never responded to my email. I must say this is disappointing and not what I have experienced at other Hampton locations.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - great location”
Reviews.Author: IndyAnnieM
Reviews.Content: This hotel is close to the shops & restaurants in the Castleton area. The staff wasn't particularly friendly upon check-in, and the pool is rather small, but the rooms are updated and clean. We slept well, but my husband's complaint was that we have better TV at home. The flat screens aren't high def and the channels are limited. The free breakfast is a nice touch, but I'd rather pay for better quality -- the fruit salad was canned and there was no real half & half, just the small creamers.

Reviews.Title: “Check your sheets; my phone did not work....besides that my stay was OK”
Reviews.Author: TokyoBob1975
Reviews.Content: Stayed from 9 to 11 August. Several issues add up to detract from my stay at this property. Constantly blinking message light on phone, but there were no messages. #3 on the phone did not work, so I could not call 2 different numbers that contained the #3. Reported the phone issues 3 times with no resolution. The unreliable phone concerned me about my wake up call on 11 Aug, but it arrived as scheduled. Prior to checking out, I was grossed out by a large stain on the mattress sheet. Not to be graphic, but it was a stain one might see in a honeymoon suite—no, I did not cause the stain. Did not notice the night before because I just crawled under the covers, but I did notice the obvious cigarette burn hole in the bed cover. This was a non-smoking room, but there was a stale smell of cigarette smoke. There are 3 entrances into the hotel. Of course, the one most convenient to my room was out of order, so I had to take a longer walk to access my room. There is a major railroad crossing adjacent to the hotel. Could hear passing trains at least 6 times in 2 days. A special train passes thru this crossing 17 times a day 6 to 22 Aug, so that may have been the train I heard. Nice LCD TV with good variety of stations. Free WiFi is secured with an access code. It was stable, but slow. Had to use Skype because my room’s phone did not work, but Skype barely worked because of the slow connections. There is only one accessible electrical outlet built into a desk / workspace. Limited the options when using my laptop or to even plug in an iron. Large breakfast served in the lobby, and there are a couple of computers with printer in the lobby’s front corner. There is a major shopping mall, movie theater, and wide variety of fast food / casual dining restaurants. I live in the real world. If 1 of the issues occurred, I would give a higher rating. This many issues in the same place, at the same time, makes me glad I was traveling solo. If anybody had been with me, I would never hear the end of it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with Great Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: Raebean
Reviews.Content: My family stayed here for a karate tournament. The staff was very courteous and friendly. They have gone beyond what would be normal expectations. The hotel was very clean and the free breakfast buffet was good. The had hot and cold options. The staff went beyond that one staff member offered to bring a customer her waffle to her table while it cooked so that they did not have to stand there and wait. Little things like that make the stay worthwhile. The hotel had an indoor pool and also swimming toys for the kids to use (diving sticks, beach ball, etc..) which was great for our kids. We enjoyed our stay and would come back again!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: mjwingfans
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on our way back from a family wedding. We had stayed 2 nights before at the Hilton down the street. I thought the Hilton was a little nicer and it was actually cheaper, but the Hampton was nice too. We stay at Hampton's often, as we find that they are usually a pretty reliable chain. The room was a bit cramped, but still nice. If you are looking for a place to stay for a night as you pass through, this would be a good choice. Always love the Hampton's complimentary breakfasts- better than any other hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: coachgh13
Reviews.Content: Walked in and smiling faces and very helpful staff started the experience off the right way. The rooms were clean and the pool was very relaxing and having a fitness room was a big plus. The free breakfast of eggs, bacon, and potatos was amazing and had something for everyone with the warm food and also donuts and orange and apple juice. Perfect location to get on and off the highway plus restaurant galore to choose from. The management staff was very nice and took great care of us with any concerns we had. Easy internet access made it nice to catch up on things away from home.

Reviews.Title: “My Top Pick While Staying In Indianapolis”
Reviews.Author: Holly9810
Reviews.Content: I stay at the Hampton atleast twice a month forn the past few years while in the area on business. The front desk staff is always polite and accomodating. The hotel is in an excellent location surrounded by restaurants, shopping...anything you need is within a few blocks. Interstate access. I find the hotel to be immaculant and all staff friendly. Access doors that are close to any room or elevator so you park close to your room. Room is always very clean, nice size, very comfortable and the hotel is very quiet. Once I had car troubles and the Gen. Mgr was kind enough to recommend a place to take my car and even met me there and gave me a ride back to the hotel. The staff goes above and beyond. Pool is always clean with very clear water. Morning paper delivered to your door every morning. I will continue to stay at this Hampton due to the friendliness of the staff, cleanness of hotel, excellent location and the fresh popcorn in the evenings while watching television. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel. My home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “BEST hotel in the Indy area!!”
Reviews.Author: prettipinkprincess68
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel many times and I simply love it! It is close to everything as far as eating and shopping. It is a very clean hotel, the amenities are fabulous and the staff goes out of their way to make sure you have everything you want while you are there. The last time I stayed here was for the Indy Nascar Race. They had little goodie bags for the people that didnt have time to eat before heading out. VERY nice touch!! I will continue to stay at this hotel every time I am in the area. NO reason to go anywhere else!!

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I needed”
Reviews.Author: dandyLA
Reviews.Content: I had the need to make a quick business trip into Indianpolis and was going to require a hotel for a couple of days. This lived up to the standards that I expect from a Hampton, the staff was exceptional in terms of friendliness and efficiency. The location was very close to what I needed workwise and in a part of town that worked out great for when I wasn't working. The amenities were what I expected and the hotel was clean,tidy and very functional. There were absolutely no surprises and that is something I value from my host when on the road.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Experience”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoBob55
Reviews.Content: Great loaction to stay when conducting business in Indianapolis. The room was clean, quiet, and the staff was freindly and courteous. I will definitely stay here again next time I am in Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “A great staff makes this a great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: MysticTea
Reviews.Content: I often have to travel on business. The staff at this hotel was very cheerful, and helpful. The associates at the front desk were very polite and professional. Even the cleaning staff greeted me as I walked through the halls. My room was very nice, and clean. The hotel location is within walking distance from some wonderful restaurants. There is also a huge shopping mall located on the same street. The breakfast in the lobby had a lot of variety, and was well maintained. The employees of this Hampton Inn understand the importance of good customer service. With that said, I will definitely be a repeat customer.

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice if You are Staying in this Part of Town”
Reviews.Author: brucegary
Reviews.Content: I booked my room for the Memorial Day weekend when Indianapolis hotels are filled for the 500 Race. Although this hotel is on the opposite side of the city from the speedway, it was very easy to get to this hotel as it is very convenient to freeway access. It is a typical Hampton Inn, with very comfortable beds and an adequate hot breakfast in the morning. This hotel has a large indoor pool.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value...Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: AlumniGuy
Reviews.Content: Went down to Indianapolis to take in a sporting event at Butler University. The hotel is located on the NE side of town in a very nice neighborhood convenient to interstates I-465 and I-69. There was a large shopping mall and a wide variety of restaurants in the immediate vicinity. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were clean. They had a nice pool but we were unable to take advantage of it. The breakfast was good and the internet access worked well. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. Only problem was a small cleanliness issue in the tub (some shaving stubble left in the soap dish). Otherwise, it was a very enjoyable stay and a great value (paid about $45/night via Hotwire).

Reviews.Title: “Cockroach in Bathroom”
Reviews.Author: Iowaman1959
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton last weekend booked through Hotwire. The decor of the rooms is quite dated and the carpet felt damp. There were hairs left on the bathroom floor when we checked in. The second night there was a huge COCKROACH on the bathroom vanity! When I notified the front desk the next morning at check out they expressed surprise, as "that room was just sprayed." Breakfast buffet only marginal and the room lacked enough seating. Only hot items were sausage patties and french toast sticks. We won't be staying here again...

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price”
Reviews.Author: TheBigHammer
Reviews.Content: I was here also in 2006, solid and simple - new beds in 2007 make for a restful stay... Be sure you ask for a room away from the interstate - keeping the fan running in the room helps to minimize the noise... Friendly staff and clean facilities make this worth the stay, a mere 15 minutes from downtown...

Reviews.Title: “Good, not great”
Reviews.Author: kcl491
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for Indianapolis 500 race. Considering the hotel (and all hotels in and around Indianapolis, it seemed) was sold out, the service was good for our 3 night stay. Not the nicest Hampton Inn I've stayed at, but not the worst. Breakfast was OK, but not enough tables for the big pre-race days rush. Lots of towels and toiletries. Nearby dining choices are limited, but the access to I-70 is excellent. Biggest surprise was that the available TV selections did not include any that showed a live telecast of the Indy 500 race. If I returned to Indianapolis, I would probably look for different hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis - NE / Castleton
HotelInfo.Address: 6817 E. 82nd Street, Indianapolis, IN 46250
